channel.title: Automatically updating item list - Using RS's update server
channel.description:
[CENTER]Credits for Connection class to Method.
Well, the popularity of my old item list went into over 10,000 downloads in the end, so i decided i would write a list which utilises Methods cache downloader and instead just requests information from RuneScape's update server and unpacks it.
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B] - Complete list of items, updated to current RuneScape. - Updates any time RuneScape does. - Generates the list in under 10 seconds on a reasonable internet connection. - Saves old version id so it dosn't take forever to connect each time. - Visual GUI list, with search features.
If there are any problems with this contact me on here or via PM, im hoping RS do not change the format soon, and if they do i will update as soon as possible.
Im contemplating releasing a version of this which reads all items, npcs and objects and repacks into 317 cache format, however i want to see some feedback asking for this, since it would be me putting more effort in and if no one is going to use i wont bother.
[B][U]Picture:[/U][/B] [img]http://www.openminecraft.net/images/auitemlist.png[/img]
Please remember to post any errors or bugs you find, as this was my first release of it it may be buggy.
And remember to post if you would use a new engine -> old engine convertor for the cache files.
Also, post if you can think of any other things i could implement, such as limiting versions or something? I could create an archive for all revisions and let you select a list or something, just post with suggestions :p
PLEASE POST AFTER USING, JUST SO I CAN CHECK IT WORKS FOR YOU ALL LOL.
[B][U]Download link:[/U][/B] [url=http://openminecraft.net/download.php?file=UpdatingItemList.zip]UpdatingItemList.zip[/url]
Have fun.[/CENTER]

item.title: Automatically updating item list - Using RS's update server
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

red_rooster:

i think this is awsome. and if you repacked the cache into 317 format that would be a great client

I’ve already done that with a server called SlashScape, i converted all content to 317 format and loaded it using an update server, however, im currently thinking about writing and releasing a tool here for it.

Read full topic

@i_own_pking wrote:

[CENTER]Credits for Connection class to Method.

Well, the popularity of my old item list went into over 10,000 downloads in the end, so i decided i would write a list which utilises Methods cache downloader and instead just requests information from RuneScape’s update server and unpacks it.

Features:

  • Complete list of items, updated to current RuneScape.
  • Updates any time RuneScape does.
  • Generates the list in under 10 seconds on a reasonable internet connection.
  • Saves old version id so it dosn’t take forever to connect each time.
  • Visual GUI list, with search features.

If there are any problems with this contact me on here or via PM, im hoping RS do not change the format soon, and if they do i will update as soon as possible.

Im contemplating releasing a version of this which reads all items, npcs and objects and repacks into 317 cache format, however i want to see some feedback asking for this, since it would be me putting more effort in and if no one is going to use i wont bother.

Picture:

Please remember to post any errors or bugs you find, as this was my first release of it it may be buggy.

And remember to post if you would use a new engine -> old engine convertor for the cache files.

Also, post if you can think of any other things i could implement, such as limiting versions or something? I could create an archive for all revisions and let you select a list or something, just post with suggestions

PLEASE POST AFTER USING, JUST SO I CAN CHECK IT WORKS FOR YOU ALL LOL.

Download link: UpdatingItemList.zip

Have fun.[/CENTER]
